mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, class_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userId}, #{classId}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, c.class_id, c.quantity, c.created_at, cl.classTitle AS classTitle, cl.classPrice AS classPrice FROM cart c JOIN class cl ON c.class_id = cl.class_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId};
